inclusion.criterion: having a diagnosis of RPL (two or more consecutive or non-consecutive first-trimester losses)
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: does not smoke and she is not sexually active

inclusion.criterion: willing and able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: they were unable to conceive naturally (as confirmed by urinary pregnancy tests)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: within 1 year of recruitment or before the end of the randomisation period in the trial, whichever came earlier
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: they had antiphospholipid syndrome [lupus anticoagulant and/or anticardiolipin antibodies (immunoglobulin G or immunoglobulin M)]
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: they had uterine cavity abnormalities (as assessed by ultrasound, hysterosonography, hysterosalpingogram or hysteroscopy)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto disease and is trying to conceive naturally. She does not have any contraindications to Levothyroxine use.
